attributes.action: Increase Police Officers on the streets and reduce the Marshals on road traffic
attributes.additional_details: Last month I was involved in 2 cases 1th I was on Buckingham Palace one guy come with an e-bike just pass and stole my phone the 2th I was in Manchester when a black Audi approached with 4 or 5 guys saying are from Manchester Police and I just run away and they started chasing me using mask. I gave a call to 999 they sent me to a Police Station which had the doors closed and I was locket out side and discovery I had a device stick on the car to track me the police came to me just 6h late.
attributes.background: The Government in UK must stop just think about make income from Marshals road traffic and start to increase a number of Police offices on the road because I can see 2 or 3 Marshals every square in UK but I don't see a police officer in a radius 3 miles. And when you call needed everyone is busy.
